resources.string:
"Augustus requires the original Caesar 3 files to run. Please follow these steps:

1. Copy your entire Caesar 3 folder from your computer to your Android device using Android File Transfer or a similar utility.
Alternatively, if you bought the game from GOG: you can use the app "Inno Setup Extractor" to extract the offline installer on your device.

2. Select that directory using the button below. This is also the directory where any saved games will be stored."
